name: test_e2e_with_logs[002_SQLI_2ND_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_2ND_002` |
| **Name** | Second-order boolean injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | second_order |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `user' OR '1'='1' --`
- **Encoded**: `user'%20OR%20'1'%3D'1'%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~56000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:32:23.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_2ND_002-1770813143441-sq780k pattern_id=SQLI_2ND_002 uri=/?q=user'%20OR%20'1'%3D'1'%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_2ND_002-1770813143441-sq780k pattern_id=SQLI_2ND_002 uri=/?q=user'%20OR%20'1'%3D'1'%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
